Big Data Innovation, San Francisco, April: Connect with Apple, NASA, and more

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Apple, Big Data Summit, CA, Data Visualization, IE Group, Innovation, IoT, NASA, San Francisco

Very few "All-access" passes remain for the Big Data Festival in San Francisco, Apr 21-22, which let to access Big Data Innovation (Keynotes: Uber, US Dept of Commerce, Airbnb, LinkedIn), Internet of Things Summit (Keynotes: Apple, Samsung, ...), and Data Visualization Summit (Keynotes: MasterCard, NASA, Pinterest).


 
There are very limited 'Access All Areas' passes remaining for the Big Data Festival in a few weeks!
 
What does this entitle you to?
 
Big Data Innovation Summit 
Keynotes: Uber, US Dept of Commerce, Airbnb, LinkedIn, Under Armour
Topics Covered: Data Strategy, Customer Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science 
 
Internet of Things Summit
Keynotes: Apple, Samsung, Comcast, Schneider Electric, Phillips, BMW 
Topics covered: Smart Home, Connected Car, mHealth & Wearable Tech, Engineering & Design 

Data Visualization Summit 
Keynotes: MasterCard, NASA, Groupon, Pinterest, Yahoo!, Canon
Topics Covered: UX/UI Design, BI Optimization, Information Architecture, Data Products 
 
 How To Get On Board
 
Contact Roy Asterley at rasterley@theiegroup.com (+1 415 692 5426) or reserve your pass here.
Don't forget to use discount code KDACCESS for $500 off 'Access All Areas' passes.
